title: Come Saturday
creator_credit: Jim Davies, Julien Caunter, Leonard Reeve and Anglo-Scottish Pictures
brief_description: A lyrical description of the way in which the people of England spend their leisure hours after work on a Saturday. Introduction by Sir Ralph Richardson.
